questions.question: Which data type is used to create a variable that should store text?
What is the output of `5 % 2` in C++?
Which of the following is the correct way to initialize a constant variable in C++?
Which function is used to find the length of a string in C++?
What is the purpose of the `return` statement in a C++ function?
options: To exit the function and return a value to the calling code.
To break the execution of the program.
questions.answer: To exit the function and return a value to the calling code.

questions.question: What is the default value of an uninitialized local variable in C++?
Which of the following is the correct syntax for a for loop in C++?
Which of the following is not a valid access specifier in C++?
Which keyword is used to declare an object in C++?
What is a pointer in C++?
options: A variable that stores the memory address of another variable.
A variable that stores an integer value.
A function that returns a variable.
A data type used to create floating-point numbers.
questions.answer: A variable that stores the memory address of another variable.
